channel.title: Server Runner
channel.description:
I bought vps, i am on it atm. I downloaded my source. Im on windows 2003 and i changed the compiler and my server runner to match my java. I start my client, and everything is fine, no error. But then i run my server, and i get 7, but what it does is it says the 7 errors quickly then closes so i cant see them.
Anytips?

item.title: Server Runner
item.dc:creator: @Ksu Ksu
item.description:
@Ksu wrote:

open up the bat file and add ‘pause’ without the ’ at the end of all other text.

Read full topic
